text: The 1954–55 Macedonian Republic League was the 11th since its establishment. Metalec Skopje won their first championship title. == Participating teams == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Club ! City |- | Belasica | Strumica |- | Bratstvo | Gostivar |- | Bregalnica | Shtip |- | Karaorman | Struga |- | Kozhuf | Gevgelija |- | Metalec | Skopje |- | Pobeda (P) | Prilep |- | Pobeda (V) | Veles |- | Prespa | Resen |- | Rabotnik | Bitola |- | Sloga | Skopje |- | Tikvesh | Kavadarci |} ==Final table== ==References== Karovski, Ilija (1996) FK Tikvesh 1930–1995 p. 46, 47, 48 ==External links== *SportSport.ba *Football Federation of Macedonia Category:Macedonian Football League seasons Yugo 3
title: 1954–55 Macedonian Republic League
